inn1.comm: begins with a nice length ball on off stump which is defended solidly by Kusal
Kusal drives this fuller length ball straight to short cover
inswinging delivery on middle as Kusal clips this off the pads, with silly mid-on misfielding, to allow for the two runs
first bit of width offered today and Perera makes Junaid pay with a lovely backfoot punch through the gap square off the wicket
Kusal drives this fuller length ball just outside off straight to mid-off
brings this one in off back of a length as Kusal defends off the back foot
Dilshan just clobbers Gul's first offering, a delivery shaping away on off stump, down the ground to find the long-off boundary
going down the pads and Dilshan simply helps it along its way, as the batsmen run three easily, with fine leg firing in the throw from the deep
again down the leg side and Kusal clips this one down to deep fine leg, taking two runs in the process

a really rubbish ball from Gul slanting outside off as Kusal is tempted to have a go, but slams still straight to short cover, who takes a good catch. Looks like it was the Pakistan captain who took that sharp take. Sri Lanka lose their first wicket with just 15 on the board. Gul has simply been on a roll since returning to international cricket
shifts the line just outside off on a length as Sangakkara plays this off the back foot towards the off side to sneak a quick single
back of a length and coming in as Dilshan is sold in defence
down the leg side and Sangakkara helps this down to fine leg for a single
Junaid delivers a testing yorker on middle which Dilshan hits straight back at the non-striker's stumps. Dilshan lucky that Junaid had not got a hand on it as Sangakkara had backed up quite a bit
this time clips through square leg to find the single
fuller length ball which is pushed down to mid-on
too full and wide and Sangakkara opens the face to guide this just behind point to the third man boundary for four
Sangakkara could have helped himself to another wide delivery on a length outside off, but plays this one into the ground to see off the over
what a beauty from Gul as he gets this to nibble away on a fuller length outside off, with Dilshan going for the expansive drive through the covers

Dilshan was definitely perturbed by the previous delivery as he decides to leave this one outside off, but this one is the inswinger, and comes back in just enough to knock back his off stump. Really tame way to go out as Sri Lanka are in a bit of bother at 22 for 2
heading down the pads as Chandimal works this down to mid-on
full and outside off as Chandimal drives this straight to mid-off
back of a length outside off, climbing quite appreciably, as Chandimal shoulders arms
drives this fuller length ball straight to mid-off to end the over
width on offer as Sangakkara square cuts straight to backward point
bowls on a good length outside off which is left alone by Sangakkara
once again outside off as Kumar edges this one intentionally through the third man region, with third man, who was at a squarish position, unable to cut it off running to his right
similar line and length as before as Sangakkara looks for the punch through extra-cover, but mistimes it
length ball outside off as Sangakkara shoulders arms
brings this one into the left-hander as he nudges this down to mid-on for a quick single
fuller length ball slanting across the batsman, which is left alone
defended towards the off side by Sangakkara
able to work this away off his pads behind square on the leg side
back of a length ball which is inside-edged by Chandimal, with the ball carrying down towards fine leg
tests him with the shorter one which Sangakkara ducks under
full and just outside off as Chandimal drills this straight to short cover
full delivery on the pads which is worked down to mid-on
Chandimal drives this one towards the off side, but can't beat the inner ring
back of a length which is pushed down to mid-off
clips this one off the pads, and with such precise timing that the ball rolls comfortably away from the chasing fielders to the midwicket boundary
full length ball defended solidly with the straightest of bats by Chandimal
in the slot but all Chandimal can succeed to do is drive this straight to mid-off to end the over
stylishly plays this through the covers, with the ball cut off before the boundary, as the Sri Lankans run three

Misbah takes another great catch, this time at short cover, as Chandimal unfurls a full-bloodied drive, in the air, straight at the Pakistan captain. Gul had set him up with the length, and Chandimal took the bait. Misbah actually plucked that one-handed, so it just gets better and better. Sri Lanka in trouble here at 36 for 3
full delivery outside off as Ashan strokes this to cover to get off the mark straightaway
this one is pushed down to mid-off, but can't get a single
back of a length slanting across the batsman as Sangakkara looks to work this away behind square
lovely length ball going across the left-hander as Sangakkara is content to allow this through to the keeper
what a beauty from Junaid as he entices Ashan to have a go at this length ball going across him. Feet were going nowhere as he had a go at this one
this one on a similar line and length as Ashan defends to the off side. Not looking very comfortable here is Ashan
almost squares him up as this one is edged away to the off side
length ball which catches the outside edge, but bounces low to second slip
back of a length as Ashan edges this one towards gully to sneak a single
length ball just outside off as Sangakkara defends to the off side
full and on the pads as Ashan clips this to midwicket
in the slot and Priyanjan plays a classy drive through extra-cover. Very smooth execution of the stroke
down the leg side as Priyanjan fails to get this past square leg
small bit of width on offer outside off as Priyanjan positions himself for a backfoot cut behind point, but can't beat backward point, who does well to get behind the ball
short of a length and Priyanjan punishes him with a competent pull in front of square for four
and he follows that up with a sublime punch off the back foot through the covers to make it three boundaries in the over. Starting to exhibit some serious class here
drags this one outside off as Sangakkara guides this one through the third man region for  a single
length ball drifting in as Ashan pushes towards the off side
clears his front leg to short-arm pull this offering towards deep midwicket
clips this one off leg stump to get the single
this one is played back to Afridi off the back foot
advances down the track as Afridi strikes him on the front pad, going for a hopeful shout, but the umpire is not interested. Batsmen are able to run the leg-bye
back of a length and shaping away as Priyanjan guides this one past slip to the third man boundary. Turned out to be a safe shot after all
angling in from outside off as Priyanjan stands tall in defence
fuller length this time outside off as Priyanjan drives straight to mid-off
length ball coming in from outside off as Priyanjan punches this towards sweeper cover for a single
straying on the pads as Sangakkara flicks this handsomely to the fine leg boundary, with deep fine leg not even in the picture
plays a classy back foot punch through the covers to retain strike for the next over
delays his shot before working Afridi off the pads for a single down the leg side
uses good footwork to try and guide this past backward point towards the third man boundary
this one is defended off the back foot by Sangakkara
waiting on the back foot before clipping this one to square leg
works this one off the pads as the Sri Lankan batsmen are rotating the strike well
drives this one outside off down to mid-off to take a quick single
full delivery outside off which is driven towards mid-off
waits on the back foot to try and guide this past a packed off side
back of a length and once again Sangakkara tries to guide this through the off side, this time past backward point
clips this one off the pads down to deep midwicket for a single
gets this one to shape in from a length as Priyanjan looks for the punch through the covers, but only succeeds in making contact with thin air
defended solidly off the back foot by Ashan
this one is steered down to long-on for a single
cuts this one to point but can't get a run
steers this to sweeper cover for a single
this one is drilled straight to short cover
too much width given as Sangakkara takes a big stride before guiding this past backward point, almost going all the way to the third man rope
defended to the off side by Ashan to see off the over
full on off as Sangakkara drives this one straight to mid-off
too full and wide as Sangakkara gets down on one knee to drive this uppishly square off the wicket
this one is driven solidly to silly mid-off, but can't beat the fielder
this one rises on Sangakkara as he looks to tuck this away to the leg side
in the slot as Sangakkara drives this one straight to mid-off, who plucks this off the ground one-handed. Have got to say, Pakistan have been excellent in the field thus far
back of a length as Sangakkara plays this with soft hands towards the leg side, able to make the single despite the throw at the striker's end
too wide from Afridi as Sangakkara cuts him away to sweeper cover for one
Afridi not learning from the previous delivery as Ashan plays a late cut through third man to find the boundary
too full this time as Ashan is able to steer this down to sweeper cover to get off strike
this one is defended off the front foot back to the bowler
cuts this wide one away to sweeper cover for a single
going down the pads as Ashan works this off the pads to register the fifty-run stand between these two
back of a length heading towards the leg stump as Ashan clips this off his pads for a single
play and a miss from Sangakkara as this one angles across him from a good length
clipped off the pads behind square on the leg side for two runs
length ball outside off which is punched towards the covers
slips in a yorker on off as Ashan does well to keep it out
Ashan looks to tuck this away to the leg side, but can't beat silly mid-on
starts off with a back of a length ball which spins away from Sangakkara as he guides this to the off side
drifts this in from outside off as Ashan gets forward to defend
Ashan positions his feet to cut this away late through third man, getting enough impetus on it for it to reach the boundary
Ajmal, going round now, gets this to straighten on leg stump as Ashan plays him watchfully
this one bounces a bit more as Ashan backs away to punch this off the back foot through the off side
full and on middle as Sangakkara defends on the front foot
back from a length and going down the leg side as Ashan helps this down to fine leg
almost inside-edges this fuller length ball to his stumps
this one shapes away outside off stump as Sangakkara shoulders arms
back of a length and outside off as Sangakkara punches this down to mid-off
tests him with a bouncer which Sangakkara ducks under
fuller length ball on and around off which Sangakara again almost inside-edges onto his stumps
back of a length outside off which is defended back to the bowler
angles his bat in hopes of steering this past point
punches this one solidly towards long-off, with silly mid-off making a fumble of it on the way
this one keeps a bit low outside off as Ashan guides this towards mid-off
this time presses forward to steer this towards square leg to bring up the Sri Lankan 100
turned to midwicket, but can't buy a run
this one on off stump as Priyanjan brings down the bat in the nick of time
cuts this shorter one towards cover, but can't beat the fielder
succeeds in finding the outside edge, but keeps low, bouncing before reaching the keeper, as Sangakkara does well to get a hand on it and stop the boundary
fires in a yorker which Ashan does well to dig out
this one angling in from outside off as Ashan is solid in defence
this one angles in from outside off as Ashan fails to get this past backward point
Ajmal does very well to field this ball placed just to the right of him with a low dive to the right
Sangakkara plays inside the line of this one as the ball rolls harmlessly to the off side
waits on the back foot to push this down to long-on for a single
back of a length and going towards off stump as Ashan cuts this away in front of square to get a boundary through the extra-cover region. A really fine innings from Priyanjan here
follows it up with a sensible single down to long-on
able to steer this off the back foot towards the covers for a single to retain strike for the next over
this one played off the back foot by Sangakkara down the leg side
this one is clipped behind square on the leg side for a single
called no-ball for height as Sri Lanka get another delivery
this short of a length ball beats Ashan as he goes for a wild swipe. I think he didn't realise that this was not a free-hit
Ashan drives this one down to mid-off, but can't sneak the single
short and going down the leg side as Ashan swivels his base to help it along down to fine leg
full and on off as Sangakkara drives this one straight down, but can't get it past mid-off
going down the pads as Ashan fails to get this away to the leg side
once again angling down the pads as Ashan pushes this off the back foot for a single
flicks this one off the pads towards square leg for one
too wide from Hafeez as Ashan looks to cut this away behind square, but can't beat the fielder in the deep
this one is steered down towards mid-off for none
plays this one back to the bowler to bring a close to the over
drifts this down the leg side as Ashan steers this to long-on
full and on the pads as Sangakkara fails to get this away
cuts this one off the back foot to sweeper cover for a single
too full from Afridi as Ashan drives this down to mid-off for a single
cuts this away outside off as Sangakkara succeeds in finding a single
defended with the straightest of bats to end the over
punches this one off the back foot down to long-off
this one going down the pads as Ashan tries to steer this past the keeper, but the umpire ends up calling it a wide
steers this one down to long-on for a single
rocks on the back foot to push this one outside off towards long-off for a single. On 49 now
this one heading down the leg side as Ashan fails to get bat on ball
nudges this off the back foot down to long-on to retain strike for the next over
fuller length ball which Ashan defends on the front foot back to the bowler
plays a classy cover drive, but can't beat the packed inner ring
this one is rushed through on a length as Ashan is solid in defence
defended solidly by Ashan as he continues to sit on 49

and he gets it with a clip to the midwicket as a beaming Ashan raises his bat to become the 3rd Sri Lankan player to score a 50 on debut. Excellent innings by Ashan, especially when you consider that he walked in at 36 for 3
pushes this down to mid-off to register his 50 as well. That would be his 83rd ODI half-century. What a gulf in experience these two have between them!
drills this one straight back at the bowler
punches this one off the back foot towards mid-off
advances down the track before deciding to go on the defensive
plays a whip with an extravagant follow-through down to square leg

tries to guide this past the point region, with the batsmen looking to complete a single, but there is a big miscommunication between the two batsmen, with Sangakkara being sold the dummy as he is well short of his crease as he looks to return back to the non-striker's. Big wicket against the run of play as these two looked comfortable for many more. The batsmen had crossed, but Sangakkara was hesitant for the run until he knew it would be safe to go through
pushes this one to long-on to bring an end to the over
cuts this one off the back foot through point, with the fielder having a misfield, as this one is recovered by sweeper cover
clips this down to deep midwicket with a wristy flourish as this one just beats the dive to the boundary
tries to help this round the corner past backward square leg
defends this one solidly off the back foot towards the bowler
Ashan just dismisses this from his presence as Afridi is a touch on the shorter side, with Priyanjan pulling this in the air over the deep midwicket boundary
going down the leg side as Ashan fails to get it away
this one going leg side as Mathews fails to turn this away to the leg side
finally able to push this flatter delivery through midwicket to get off the mark
dances down the track before clearing deep midwicket with a one-bounce four. Is playing a tremendous innings on debut
tries to get this past square leg, but fails to do so
this one is nudged off the back foot, but there really was never a run there
full and wide as Ashan was looking for a drive through cover, but instead hits this through the point region
begins with a back of a length delivery outside off which is steered behind square on the off side for a single
similar length as before as Ashan runs this down to third man for a single
back of a length and going down the leg side as another misfield at silly mid-on allows for an extra run to be taken
back of a length outside off which is pulled in front of square for a single
plays a shot down to midwicket, but not in control of this
seams in from short of a length as Ashan almost chops this onto his stumps
going down the pads as Mathews fails to get this away
similar result as before as Mathews waits patiently
this time succeeds in pushing this down to long-on for a single
goes for the loft over the infield, and even though he doesn't middle it, this was hit in open space, so turns out to be a safe shot
waits on the back foot before tucking this away to the leg side for one
length ball going down the leg side as Mathews gets a single down to long-on
back of a length, outside, off, as Mathews punches this straight to short cover
back of a length as Mathews fails to get this past mid-off
plays this one with soft hands towards the off side, and is able to sneak a quick single
straying down the pads as Ashan has all days to get this down to square leg
defends this one with a straight bat off the back foot
full from Gul as Mathews lofts him elegantly, but doesn't time it well, as this just evades mid-off, who is running backwards in hoping of snagging the catch
this one is played to the leg side, but can't get the run
carbon copy of the previous delivery, with a similar result
able to steer this down to long-on to get that much-needed single
this one straying down the pads as Mathews helps this off his pads for a single
plays this one straight to mid-on
waits on the back foot before pushing it down to mid-on
begins with a delivery going down the leg side as the keeper fails to gather it down the leg side, with umpire calling five wides
again too straight as Mathews helps this down to fine leg with a clip off his pads
striking the pads as this one was heading down the leg side

Junaid knocks him over with a good length ball on the stumps, as Ashan, looking to play this one cheekily through fine leg with a paddle, ends up getting his off stump knocked back. The shot was never really on as his fine innings come to a rather abrupt end on 74
fires in a yorker on middle which is dug out successfully
full and straight again, Kulasekara taps it back down the track
defends off the back foot with a straight bat to mark the end of the over
this one on leg stump as Mathews turns this one down to backward square
clipped off the pads to the leg side to get off the mark straightaway
cuts this one away in front of the stumps, with the ball almost carrying all the way to the sweeper cover boundary
defended off the front foot by Kulasekera
decides not to offer a shot to this one pitching outside leg and spinning in
ends up spooning this low full toss straight back to Ajmal, almost as if he was in a daze, as this half-hearted push is caught one-handed by Ajmal to bring a premature end to Kulasekera's innings
going round the wicket as Mathews defends off the back foot towards the off side
back of a length which rears up at Mathews, who does well to negotiate it
down the pads and Mathews obliges with a glance past backward square to the fine leg boundary
what a stunner from Mathews! dances down the track and flat-bats Junaid over the straight boundary for six. Had a beautiful arc as the ball came down
this fuller length ball is defended straight back to the bowler
back of a length on middle as Mathews plays this one straight to mid-on to bring a close to the over
and the debutant gets off the mark with a push towards cover for a single.
defended to the off side by Mathews off the front foot
looks to create room to work this away to the off side, but can't penetrate the gap
looks to angle this through the leg side, but fails to get it away
presses forward to keep out this Ajmal offering
back of a length and off the pads as Mathews help this round the corner for a single
gives this some air as Mathews tries to work this away to the leg side
going down the leg side as Mathews gropes to help this round the corner. Called wide by the umpire
plays the most emphatic reverse-sweep to get a four through the vacant third man region. Just powered that one to the fence
looks to steer this through the leg side, but finds square leg
drags this down past the leg side as Mathews steps inside the line to let it go through. Called wide again by the umpire
punches this off the back foot down to long-on for a single
floated on middle which Vithanage does well to keep out
steers this one down to mid-on to finish the over
defends this one right back to Ajmal
waits on the back foot before pushing this down to long-on for one
straying down the leg side as yet another wide is called
tossed up outside off. Vithanage drives hard but is stopped well at cover
looks to tuck this away off the pads to the leg side
able to work this off the back foot, but can't beat mid-off
plays this one to midwicket to bring an end to the over
punched off the back foot down to the leg side
punched again off the back foot towards extra-cover
able to clip this off his pads down to midwicket for a single
nudges this one down to mid-on for one
takes this on the full with a swipe down to midwicket, but didn't time this at all well
gets low on one knee to hoick Hafeez to the midwicket boundary for four
tucks this away to the leg side,  but can't get a run
this time is able to get enough on it with a punch through extra-cover
defends this one carefully on the front foot
gets this away behind square on the leg side for a single
makes room in an attempt to get this away to the leg side for a single
looks to chop this one down outside off to the covers to get a single which will mean he retains strike for the next over
again goes for a wild swipe, with the ball carrying through to square leg. Intended for that to go over midwicket
length ball which turns in slightly as Vithanage tries to work this to the leg side, but inside-edges onto his body
dropped bowls a fuller one which Vithanage reverse sweeps straight to backward square, who does his best to try and hold onto this, but drops it
length is right for a reverse sweep, and he obliges, this time getting it over backward square to find the boundary
backs away before going for the hoick down to long-on

fuller one which has Mathews caught on the back foot. This one looked plumb but Mathews wants the umpire to have a second look. After quite a while of deliberation, the third umpire confirms the on-field decision, and Mathews goes for a well-played 38
Ajmal simply on a roll as he bowls Senanayake first ball, with this one coming in from round the wicket and going through the gate left open by pad and bat
and almost gets him to edge behind, with this one going across him and beating the outside edge, with Lakmal looking to get bat on that ball
prompts Lakmal to press forward in defence
this one is defended solidly on the front foot to the off side
finishes the over by presenting the straightest of bats
has a flash outside off as this one beats the bat on its way to the keeper
gets this to cut in from a length as Vithanage somehow works this away to the leg side
gets this to angle in from back of a length as Lakmal is solid in defence
pitches this up a bit further as Lakmal is invited for the drive, with the ball beating the bat
full once more as Lakmal fails to get bat on ball, with the ball rushing past the off stump
back of a length, this time on the stumps, as Lakmal keeps this out competently
goes for the big heave, but misses the ball entirely
pulls out the reverse sweep, and to good effect, as this one flies to the fine leg boundary
once again looking to sweep down the leg side, but the ball was too leg side, with the umpire calling it a wide
defended carefully on the front foot by Vithanage
plays this with soft hands to find a single down the leg side
this one straying down the pads as Vithanage helps this along to beat backward square to the boundary
goes for the big heave as Vithanage gets a bottom-edge onto Umar Akmal's pads behind, with the keeper failing to grasp the chance. Can't really call it a chance though as it was on to him quickly
defended solidly on the front foot by Lakmal
full and outside off, Lakmal drills it down the track. Junaid gets a hand to it and deflects it to cover
full and just outside off as Junaid is unlucky to miss the off stump by mere inches. Vithanage going for the big heave over extra-cover there
this time honing on the pads as Vithanage goes for the big swing through midwicket
looks to get under this almost yorker length delivery, but Junaid does well to get a hand on it and stop it from going over him

full and on leg as Vithanage goes for the big hit over midwicket, but doesn't get enough on it as the ball carries to Maqsood at deep midwicket, who holds on to the chance. Pakistan now nine down and with still two overs to go
Malinga plays this one carefully towards point
backs away to try and create space, but the ball spins too far away from him
presses forward slightly to defend this offering to the off side
goes for the big leg side hoick, but the ball crashes into the pads
once again going for the big swipe and this time Malinga gets an outside edge which Akmal does well to catch from behind.

inn2.comm: and Pakistan are underway with Sharjeel's push outside off towards point
swinging across Shehzad as he defends this to the off side
on the pads as Sharjeel clips this off the pads to deep square leg
Sharjeel drives this fuller length ball uppishly towards mid-off, with the ball falling just short of the fielder
swinging away outside off which Sharjeel fails to get bat on ball to
back of a length on and around off which is pushed to the off side to bring an end to the over
back of a length as Shehzad is solid in defence
gets this to nip away outside off as the ball stays lower than expected by Shehzad
defends this length ball to the off side without too much fanfare
shifts the line a tad closer as Shehzad is solid in defence
once again defended to the off side by Shehzad
able to lean in for a drive through the off side, but can't get it past mid-off
unfurls a lovely drive through extra-cover which beats a chasing Kusal Perera to the boundary. First boundary of the innings from Pakistan
tries to steer this past mid-on, but fails to do so
enough width on offer as Shehzad plays an elegant punch off the back foot that just races to the boundary for four
driven to mid-off but can't get the single
length ball which shapes in as Shehzad rocks forward to defend this to the leg side
in the slot and Shehzad just epitomises class with a lovely-timed drive through extra-cover. Looks to be in good touch today
what a shot from Sharjeel. Just punches this off the back foot with the most minimal of follow-throughs as this just seems to gather steam along the carpet on its way to the square boundary
fires it in from round the wicket as Sharjeel drives on the up, but can't beat mid-off
Sharjeel knows there is no one in the deep on the off side as he intentionally hits this over the fielders on the 30 yard line to just get to the square boundary
back of a length and heading down the leg side as Sharjeel tries to tuck this away
low full toss outside off which Sharjeel almost drags onto his stumps, but luck is on his side today as the ball carries through to fine leg
yorker on middle which is successfully dug out by Sharjeel to bring an end to the over
on the pads as Shehzad clips this one down to deep square leg
in the slot as Shehzad goes for the drive through the off side for a single
low full toss which Sharjeel spoons uppishly to point
length ball swinging in which is inside-edged onto the pads, with height also playing a factor, as Lakmal goes for the appeal. But this one was definitely sliding down the leg side
glances this back of a length offering to fine leg for a single
slips in an inswinger which seems to hit Sharjeel's pads, as the Sri Lankans go up for the shout, but the umpire deems it not out. Looked pretty good that one. Will have to wait to see the replay

slower, back of a length ball, as Mathews gets a fantastic Christmas present, with this one bowling Sharjeel, who seemed to be playing the wrong line, as this one beats the edge on the way to the off stump
full length ball on off stump which is steered down to midwicket
length outside off as Mathews is unlucky not to get this wicket as well as Hafeez plays a French cut which beats the keeper on the way to the fine leg boundary
in the slot but Hafeez succeeds in driving this straight to mid-off
slower ball on off which is driven straight back to the bowler
back of a length which is punched straight to cover
Shehzad on the front foot to defend this competently to the off side
back of a length and coming in as Hafeez just runs this down to third man
tests him with a bouncer which Hafeez is quickly on as he powers this to the square leg boundary
once again down the pads and Hafeez punishes him, this time with a neat swivel-pull to the fine leg fence. This one just raced across the outfield
on a length outside off as Hafeez sensibly shoulders arms
this time caresses this outside off to reach the third man boundary. Christmas seems to be coming early for Pakistan fans!
defends this one carefully to the off side
on the front foot as he plays this one with soft hands to the leg side
defends this length ball shaping in carefully towards the off side
in the slot outside off as Shehzad drills this straight to short cover
punches this length ball outside off towards deep backward point for a single
defends this one to the off side as Pakistan sit on 49 for 1
on a length outside off as Shehzad chips him to deep midwicket for a couple. Brings up the fifty as well
this one is defended solidly on the front foot by Shehzad
punched to the covers for another boundary. Pakistan seem to be in a hurry here
plays a lovely back foot drive which unfortunately is snared by extra-cover at the 30-yard line
back of a length which is defended to the off side
tries to steer this past point off the back foot, but the fielder makes a valiant dive to take most of the pace off that ball
succeeds in getting a low, outside edge which falls just short of first slip
this time plays off the back foot, but can't beat square leg
cuts this away behind square as this one races along to third man
full and just outside off as Hafeez drives this gently down to mid-off
tries to cut this away off the back foot through point, but finds the fielder
tucks this one away to mid-on to bring an end to the over
defends this one solidly on the front foot towards the off side
attempts to steer this past point, but can't beat the fielder
full and just outside off as Shehzad drives this straight into the waiting hands of short cover
going down middle and leg as Shehzad tucks this away to midwicket for one
defended solidly off the back foot by Hafeez
sees this one early as he gets into position quickly to pull this short one to the midwicket boundary, just beating the incoming fielder from square leg
able to guide this in front of square for a single to get off strike
Hafeez ends up playing this one back to Mathews, who fields the ball on his follow-through
length ball which comes in as Hafeez is solid in defence
gets behind the line of this medium-paced delivery with ease
a more drivable length as Hafeez steers this down to deep extra-cover

would you believe it? Mathews 'surprises' Shehzad, who was looking to make room to play this down the leg side, with a bouncer. You read that one correctly. An Angelo Mathews bouncer. What has the world come to?

starts off with a back of a length ball which is carved away through extra-cover, with the fielder just about able to rein it in before the ball hit the rope. Good effort there from the Sri Lankan fielder
this one is full on off stump as Shehzad guides this one through point, with Dilshan chasing it down to retrieve and throw it back to the keeper
Hafeez gets forward to defend this Malinga offering to the off side
plays a lovely lofted hook which deep fine leg gets under, but because of the momentum has to go over the rope, so a six is signalled. Courageous shot that from Hafeez
once again short and Hafeez punishes him by pulling this fiercely, with the ball racing across the pitch to the fine leg boundary
pitches this one up on off as Hafeez defends this one carefully back to the bowler
cut away off the back foot to deep point for two runs
this one is played away to the leg side for a single
this one is pushed off the back foot down to long-off
edges this one towards the slip, who is unable to get a hand on it, as the ball races behind for a boundary
able to work this leg side delivery down to deep square leg
width on offer as Hafeez makes room to cut this away in front of square to bring up his 8th boundary
this one is worked down to the fine leg fielder for a single
on middle and leg as Hafeez clips this gently down to deep midwicket
attempted slower yorker which is worked away to the leg side for a couple
steers this fuller length ball through the leg side, but can't sneak a single
defended to the off side by Hafeez
this one angling down the pads as Hafeez tries to work this away down the leg side
once again succeeds in getting an outside edge as short third man has to recover the ball
this one is defended competently on the front foot by Hafeez
back of a length and clipped off the pads for a single
makes sure to get behind the line of the ball and keep this out
once again solid in defence as he presents the straightest of bats
drills this one straight to short cover to bring an end to the over
brings the bat down to keep this length ball from Malinga out
slower yorker on middle which is kept out successfully Hafeez, who is still sitting on 49
back of a length and helped down to fine leg as Hafeez's good series continues. Can he become the first Pakistani to score three ODI hundreds in a bilateral series? Certainly on his way now
too short from Malinga as Shehzad is quickly on the back foot to wallop this through midwicket for four. Also brings up the team 100 as wel
short again but Shehzad doesn't get enough on it as this one carries to deep square leg for a single
this one is pushed down to mid-on, but the batsmen are unable to get a single
pushes this one down to mid-off for none
waits patiently before guiding this straight to short cover
this time is able to work this away to midwicket for a single
defended back towards the bowler by the Professor
once again defended back to the bowler
this time is able to guide it towards mid-off, but hits it too well that he can't go for the single
back of a length which is defended straight back to the bowler
gets this to slant across Shehzad as he goes for a punch through the covers
able to get this off the pads down to deep fine leg, with the pair running hard to complete two
drives this one towards mid-on for one
length ball going across Hafeez as he pushes this towards silly mid-off
plays the short-arm pull to this length delivery from Lakmal down to midwicket
defends this one watchfully on the front foot
advances down the track to clear the off spinner over the long-on boundary for six. Is looking in imperious form here
this time hangs on the back foot before pushing this offering down to mid-off
rocks on the back foot to play this off the pads towards silly mid-on
full and just outside off as he defends on the front foot
turned to midwicket, but cant' get a run
slants this across the right-hander as Shehzad is content to shoulder arms

not sure what Shehzad was thinking there as he edges this one straight into the hands of first slip from this back of a length offering from Lakmal. Was set on 44 and there really was no need for this, as Senanayake does well to hold on to the chance
decides to let this through to the keeper
high on the pads as Maqsood is able to glance this off his hips to get off the mark
tries to get this away to midwicket, but almost inside-edges, as he sneaks the run which earns him 4000 ODI runs
defends this back of a length delivery to the left of Lakmal
goes round the wicket to Hafeez who just clips him through midwicket for a single
this one rises sharply outside off as Maqsood backs away
this one is punched straight down to mid-off
this one gets high on Maqsood as he is able to keep it down, playing this with soft hands down to the leg side
waits on the back foot before attempting a clip through long-on
slower yorker on leg which is helped down to square leg for a single
goes round the wicket to Hafeez who pulls this down to deep midwicket for a couple
able to punch this off the back foot down to sweeper cover
this one is pitched fuller, but Hafeez can't get it past silly mid-off
width on offer as this was cut in front of square for a single
straying on the pads as Maqsood steers this to mid-on
plays this one off the back foot down to Mathews at long-on
short and wide as Hafeez fails to pull this through the leg side, instead hitting the ball directly onto the surface near him
into position quickly to swivel and pull this down to fine leg, but can't beat the fielder stationed near the boundary
slower ball outside off which is run down to third man for one
length ball swinging sway as Hafeez drives this straight to cover
once again employs the pull shot to fine leg to get a run
steers this one straight to mid-on to bring an end to the over
strokes this one down to deep extra-cover to get two runs
on a length as Hafeez punches this straight to short cover point
works this one off the legs down to midwicket
clips this down to deep square leg for one
once again worked off the pads down to deep midwicket. The batsmen are rotating strike well
tests him with a bumper which Maqsood gets on top of quite easily
almost succeeds in chopping this back of a length offering onto his stumps
waits on the back foot before knocking this one down to mid-on
worked off the pads down to deep midwicket, as the pair think of two, but decide against it
back of a length outside off which is defended towards point
gets tall to try and cut this away past point, but the fielder does well to get a hold of it
works this one down to the leg side to retain strike for the next over
pushes this one down to mid-off
drags this outside off as Maqsood cuts this away down to deep extra-cover
clips this one off the pads towards deep square leg, with the pair running hard to get two
defends this one carefully to the leg side
steers this one down to square leg, but cant' get a single
gets on the back foot to cut this away for a single
worked away to the leg side by the Professor
Hafeez given enough width to caress this behind point for the first four in some time now
brings this one a tad closer as Hafeez defends back to the bowler
looks to find room on the off side with this push, but instead hits it down to mid-off
driven straight past the bowler as the batsmen sneak a single
pushes this one past the right of the bowler, but can't beat mid-on, as the pair decide against the single
waits on the back foot before clipping this down to deep midwicket for one
Maqsood guides this one down to long-on to pinch a single
able to beat a diving silly mid-on as the pair sneak yet another single
tries to get this away on the leg side, but succeeds in only hitting it back to the bowler
played cautiously on the back foot by Maqsood
once again plays this with soft hands, this time towards the off side, bringing an end to the over
starts off with one outside off which gives the Professor too much room as he cuts away behind square, beating a diving Malinga to the rope
flights this on middle as Hafeez digs this out
a real rubbish ball going down the leg side as Hafeez should have done more with this, but instead hits this straight to deep fine leg
leans out to drive this straight to sweeper cover
plays a lofted shot over long-on to get the second four of the over
ends the 30th over with a defensive push back to the bowler
defends this one watchfully on the front foot
wants to advance down the track, but when he realises the line of the ball is going down the leg side, he pads at the ball. Because of that, they are unable to take extra runs
going down the leg side again as Maqsood helps this round the corner
defended carefully by Hafeez on the front foot
looks to steer this through the leg side, but finds silly mid-on
waits on the front foot before presenting the straightest of bats to the bowler
starts round the wicket as Maqsood pushes this straight to silly mid-on
comes down the track and plays it down to long-on for a single
tries to steer this behind square on the leg side, but finds square leg
punches this one off the back foot through the covers for a single
able to help this round the corner down to fine leg for one
waits on the back foot before working this down to deep midwicket to retain strike for the next over
angles his bat to get this down to long-on for a single
this one going down the pads as Maqsood is able to sneak a run down the leg side
this one stays low off the pitch as Hafeez plays this with soft hands
presses forward to defend this to the leg side
able to play this with soft hands to the off side and run a quick single
plays this straight to silly mid-on to end the over
stays low off the pitch as Hafeez backs away to play this down to mid-off, with Maqsood not keen on the run

works this leg side delivery off the pads to bring up his 9th ODI hundred and, more importantly, the third of the series, becoming the first since Zaheer Abbas in over 30 years to hit three tons in a bilateral series. What a comeback after the SA debacle earlier this year
proceeds to play this one off the back foot down to deep midwicket. Looking very elated at the moment is Hafeez
drives this straight back to the bowler, who does get a hand on it, but can't prevent the run from being taken
nudges this one down to long-on for a single
waits on the back foot before clearing long-off with the cleanest of strikes to hit the first six in quite some time...
defended solidly off the back foot by the Professor
plays this one off the back foot, but directly into the waiting hands of short cover point
pushes this one off the back foot to get a single
punched off the back foot through extra-cover for four
drives this one straight back at Lakmal, who dives to stop the ball
looking to drive through the off side, instead hits leg side, but can't get a run
this one stays low as Hafeez works it down to long-on for a single
in the gap between cover and mid-off as Maqsood is able to find the extra-cover boundary
defended solidly on the front foot as Hafeez calls for the run, and gets it
this one is pushed to the leg side by the Professor for one
gets an edge which runs down the third man region as the batsmen run two
played back to the bowler, who misfields it, as the pair take a single
this one is punched off the back foot, but they can't get a single
yorker on middle which is squirted away towards point
another yorker, this time on the leg stump, as Maqsood is able to dig it out
shorter one which is glanced off his hips towards the leg side
drives this one through the gap in the covers as Hafeez now goes past 400 runs for the series
steered down to mid-on to bring an end to the over
gets on the back foot to work this down to square leg, and runs hard enough for the pair to complete two runs
once again nudged off the back foot through the leg side by the Professor
drives this one just to the left of the bowler, who does well to get a hand on it
is able to get on the back foot and push this down to deep midwicket for one
once again worked down to deep square leg
yet another single, this time down to long-on, as Pakistan chip away at the required target
swivels on the back foot to pull this Lakmal offering down to fine leg
on the back foot as Hafeez whisks this off his pads
sticks his bat out in an attempt to run this down to third man, but instead hits it more square off the wicket
powerfully hits this down the ground. Exquisite shot that from the tall right-hander. Invokes flashes of Inzy there
this time drives on the up through extra-cover, with the ball carrying just short of Chandimal at silly mid-off
this one is steered straight to cover to bring an end to the 39th over
tucks this away to the leg side for one
goes for the drive through the covers, but misses it, along with the keeper, as the ball goes all the way to the third man boundary to make it four byes
and with a chip to midwicket, Maqsood brings up the century partnership between these two
on the back foot as Hafeez works this off the pads down to deep midwicket
rocks on the back foot before cutting this through point, but finds the fielder
once again on the back foot as this time he is able to pierce the gap to get enough on it to find the extra-cover boundary

starts off with a wide down the leg side which evades the keeper as well, with the ball carrying all the way to the boundary to make it five wides. What a turnaround in emotion he must be feeling at the moment, especially after that amazing knock up front
defended to the leg side by Hafeez
this time tries to guide this one past point
steers this one again into the waiting clutches of backward point
once again tries to push it past backward point, and looks for the run, but can't seem to find it with the throw returning back to the keeper
and despite playing this into the gap at covers, Hafeez still can't buy a run. I think he wants Maqsood to get to his fifty with a six
well that didn't work out so well as Maqsood steers this to midwicket for one to seal an eight-wicket victory
